iconList.content: Responsible for the bespoke front-end implementation of the patented Augmented Reality, 3D, and Virtual Try-On experiences from recently acquired Generic Startup while also integrating seemlesly into an existing client web channel.
Worked with client UX design teams to ensure that all experiences communicate a clients brand, design standards, and business objectives.
Optimized implementation decisions and designs using A/B testing data on user interaction, user conversion information, and client feedback.

additionalTimeframeEvents.content: Generic Startup is acquired by Generic Social Media Company

iconList.content: Designed, implemented and scaled a reusable & accessible Design System which leveraged design standards from the global Generic Fin-tech Company UX team while establishing a community-driven standard of code re-usability, readability, and quality.
Strategized future-state enterprise level JS framework solutions like a framework agnostic front end approach using Web Components.

Co-designed and rapidly developed prototypes with the global user experience team to transition hero Generic Fin-tech Company's website components like navigation and footer from an adaptive experience to a unified responsive solution.
